preferences:
My finance preferences for ranking articles:

Market Focus:
- Major market movements (S&P 500, NASDAQ, Dow Jones)
- Cryptocurrency developments (Bitcoin, Ethereum)
- Currency markets (EUR/USD, GBP/USD)

Sectors of Interest:
- Technology stocks (FAANG companies)
- Banking and financial services
- Energy sector developments
- Healthcare and pharma

Economic Indicators:
- Federal Reserve decisions and monetary policy
- Inflation reports and economic data
- Employment statistics
- GDP growth and recession indicators

Company Focus:
- Earnings reports from major corporations
- Mergers and acquisitions
- IPOs and market debuts
